generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible tram tracks and lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs or other obstacles, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Several multi-story buildings are visible along the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are present along both sides of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road, and one car is driving in the middle of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections along the road.
- traffic sign: A blue directional sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the road, behind some trees.
